Associated Projects
Spacemonkeyz

A cartoon band within the Gorillaz universe who create their own music; mostly remixes.

Monkey: Journey to the West

An album made in the style of Gorillaz, based on an opera Damon Albarn & Jamie Hewlett had previously worked on.

Gorillaz Sound System

Remi Kabaka Jr.â€™s club project, remixing and reworking Gorillaz songs; along with various other Club songs in DJ sets.

Kong Solar Studio

A solar-powered recording studio built by Gorillaz & E.ON; which was used to create a music video and an EP.

Gorillaz x Reprezent

A three-day Gorillaz-themed takeover on Reprezent; with several discussions, mixes & live performances.
